00001 /*
00002  * File: Ifacility.h
00003  * ------------
00004  * Header file for class ifaciliy (abstract base class for all kinds of different facilities, 
00005  * such as well, manifold, pipeline, etc)
00006  *
00007  * Created 08/22/06  By yljiang
00008  */
00009 #ifndef IFACILITY_H_
00010 #define IFACILITY_H_
00011 
00012 #include "../sim/EnumDef.h"
00013 #include "../fluid/Fluid.h"
00014 #include "../utl/DataPool.h"
00015 
00016 class GPRS_Matrix;
00017 class SubRRBlk;
00018 class SubWRBlk;
00019 class SubRWBlk;
00020 
00021 class WellCompl;
00022 
00023 class Ifacility {
00024 
00025 public:
00026 
00027         Ifacility(){};
00028         ~Ifacility() {};
00029         // ====================================================
00030         // ================== public methods ==================
00031         // ====================================================
00032         virtual void initialize() = 0;                  // initialize well and its controls
00033         virtual void calcInitProps() = 0;               // record the wellbore pressures at old time step 
00034         virtual void calcProps() = 0;                   // calculate properties for each Newton iter
00035         virtual void linearize(double dt) = 0;  // calculate Well Jacobian (RRJ, WRJ, RWJ, WWJ) 
00036                                                                                         // and RHS (WRHS, WWRHS)
00037         virtual void retract() = 0;                             // retract to old timestep values for vellbore pressure, if can not converge
00038         virtual bool newtonUpdate() = 0;                // Newton update
00039         virtual bool isValidWell() = 0; 
00040         virtual bool convergeF() = 0;
00041         virtual bool convergeDY() = 0;
00042         virtual void report(double t) = 0;
00043         virtual void report(ofstream &os, double t) = 0;
00044 
00045         virtual void witeDataToRestart(ofstream& reStartFile)=0;
00046         virtual void readDataToRestart(ifstream& reStartFile)=0;
00047 
00048         virtual void thermalUpdate() = 0;       // Thermal update
00049         virtual void expandWellJacobian() { assert(false); } // expand Jacobian or Thermal
00050 
00051         virtual void setWellRate(double rate) {;}
00052 
00053         // ================== getters ==================
00054         char*                           getName()                               { return mName; }
00055         char*                           getResName()                    { return mResName; }    
00056         virtual int                     getType() = 0;                  //added for tracer;
00057         FacModelType            getFacModelType()               {return mModelType;}    
00058 
00059         virtual int             getNSegs() {assert(false); return 0; }
00060         virtual int             getNSegEqns() {assert(false); return 0; }
00061 
00062         int                                     getNPerfs()                                     { return nPerfs; }      
00063         virtual WellCompl*      getWellCompl() = 0;
00064         int                                     getExtra() const                { return mExtra; }
00065         int                                     getnObjEqns() const             { return nObjEqns; }
00066 
00067         // --- getters for well Jacobian and RHS ---
00068         virtual GPRS_Matrix*    getWWJ_Mat() = 0;
00069         virtual GPRS_Matrix*    getWRJ_Mat() = 0;
00070         virtual GPRS_Matrix*    getRWJ_Mat() = 0;
00071         virtual double*         getAccuCompRate() = 0;
00072 
00073         virtual double*         getRRJ()                                { return mThermal ? mRRJ_T : mRRJ; }
00074         virtual double*         getWRJ()                                { return mThermal ? mWRJ_T : mWRJ; }
00075         virtual double*         getRWJ()                                { return mThermal ? mRWJ_T : mRWJ; }
00076         virtual double*         getWWJ()                                { return mWWJ; }
00077         virtual double*         getWRHS()                               { return mThermal ? mWRHS_T: mWRHS; }
00078         virtual double*         getWWRHS() = 0;
00079 
00080         // --- getters for short part of Jacobian and RHS, only valid for thermal ---
00081         virtual double*         getRRJ_S()                              { return mRRJ; }
00082         virtual double*         getWRJ_S()                              { return mWRJ; }
00083         virtual double*         getRWJ_S()                              { return mRWJ; }
00084         virtual double*         getWRHS_S()                             { return mWRHS; }
00085 
00086         // --- getters for preconditioner info. ---
00087         virtual void            getPreMatInfo(double* &mPreWWJ_, double* &mPreWRJ_, double* &mPreRWJ_, 
00088                                                                                 int* &mPreWWRHSflag_, int* &mPresVarflag_, int &mnWells_,
00089                                                                                 int* &mnWellEqns_, int* &mSubPerf_)
00090                                                 {       
00091                                                         mPreWWJ_ = mPreWWJ; 
00092                                                         mPreWRJ_ = mPreWRJ; 
00093                                                         mPreRWJ_ = mPreRWJ; 
00094                                                         mPreWWRHSflag_ = mPreWWRHSflag;
00095                                                         mPresVarflag_ = mPresVarflag;
00096 
00097                                                         mnWells_ = nTWells;
00098                                                         mnWellEqns_ = mnWellEqns;
00099                                                         mSubPerf_ = mSubPerf;
00100                                                 }
00101 
00102         virtual double*         getWHPhaseVRate() = 0;                                  // $PS$: for constraint
00103         virtual double          getBHP() = 0;                                                   // $PS$: for constraint
00104         virtual double          getWellBlockPres() = 0;                                 // $PS$: for constraint
00105         virtual void            setBHP(double new_bhp) = 0;                             // $PS$: for constraint
00106         virtual void            setFluidModel(Fluid *f)         { mFluid = f; mFluidType = mFluid->getFluidType();}
00107         bool                            IsWContChanged() const          { return mWContChange; }
00108         bool                            IsWellOpen() const                      { return mStatus; }
00109 
00110 // new added functions
00111         virtual int         getnTWells() const          { return nTWells; }
00112         virtual void        calcStartupProps()          { assert(false); }
00113 
00114 protected:
00115         
00116         // =======================================================
00117         // ================== protected methods ==================
00118         // =======================================================
00119         virtual void switchWellCont()= 0;               // switch well control, when cur control is invalid     
00120         virtual void createData() = 0;                  // create data
00121         virtual void readData(FileIO &fio) = 0;         // read well data       
00122         virtual void setName(char* name) = 0;           // set Well name
00123         virtual void setupOutput() = 0;
00124 
00125         // =======================================================
00126         // ================= protected variables =================
00127         // =======================================================
00128         double dt;
00129         char *mName;                                    // faci name 
00130         char *mResName;                                 // the reservoir name where well is located
00131 
00132         FacModelType mModelType;                // StdWell or MSWell;
00133 
00134         bool mStatus;                                   // well status (0: closed;      1: open)
00135         bool mOldStatus;                                // well status at previous timestep
00136 
00137         int nPerfs;                                             // number of well perforations
00138         int nComps, nPhases, nVars;
00139         
00140         int nObjEqns;                                   // number of equations of the well;
00141         int *mnWellEqns;                // NEW ADDED: Number of eqns of each well
00142         int *mSubPerf;                  // NEW ADDED: Number of perfs of each well
00143         int nTWells;                    // NEW ADDED: Number of wells
00144 
00145         int mExtra;                                             // need Extra Well Jac|RHS 
00146                                                                         // mExtra = 0: no need (BHP controlled well) 
00147                                                                         // mExtra = 1: "half" need (rate controlled single block well) 
00148                                                                         // mExtra = 2: need (rate controlled multiblock well) 
00149         
00150         bool mBlackOil;                                 // black-oil? 
00151         bool mWContChange;                              // well control changed?
00152 
00153         int mThermal;
00154         int nComps_T, nVars_T;
00155 
00156         // --- Well Jacobi and RHS terms ------
00157         double *mRRJ;                                   // Res_Res Jac  (nPerf*nComps*nVars)
00158         double *mRWJ;                                   // Res_Well Jac (nPerf*nComps*1) 
00159         double *mWRJ;                                   // Well_Res Jac (nPerf*1*nVars) 
00160         double *mWWJ;                                   // Well_Well Jac (1*1)          
00161         double *mWWRHS;                                 // Well_Well RHS (1)
00162         double *mWRHS;                                  // Res_Well RHS  (nPerf*nComps*1) 
00163 
00164         // --- Well Jacobi and RHS terms (termal extension)
00165         double *mRRJ_T;                                 // Res_Res Jac  (nPerf*nComps*nVars)
00166         double *mRWJ_T;                                 // Res_Well Jac (nPerf*nComps*1) 
00167         double *mWRJ_T;                                 // Well_Res Jac (nPerf*1*nVars) 
00168         double *mWRHS_T;                                // Res_Well RHS  (nPerf*nComps*1)
00169         double *mWWRHS_T;       
00170 
00171         double *mPreRWJ;                                // For preconditioning purpose of complex well model
00172         double *mPreWRJ;                                // 
00173         double *mPreWWJ;                                // 
00174         double *mPreWWRHS;                              // In fact, this is a useless variable  
00175         int *mPreWWRHSflag;                             // describe which elements should be picked up to form bp.
00176         int *mPresVarflag;                              // describe where the pressure varables located.
00177         double localtime;
00178 
00179 
00180         Fluid *mFluid;                                  // pointer to compositional fluid
00181         FluidType mFluidType;                   // temp variable
00182 };
00183 
00184 #endif
